Articles.Content: Hi, I was wondering what peoples thoughts on the ETA of KSP on PS4 was, or if theres was any information on the subject. I know I know KSP on consoles "boo blah boo" whatever. I started playing KSP probably about four years ago now but haven't been able to play for about the last year due to a shot PC so I haven't even been able to enjoy 1.0. However I have a PS4 and greatly anticipate the release even if I have to buy the game again as KSP is one of my favorite things. (up there with TES IV Oblivion... /Fallout 4 hype). Thanks.
I've never known the KSP community to get an ETA on anything except the 1.0 release. I don't think that'll change with the system type it's running on.
I meant an estimated time FROM the community. Maybe someone who has knowledge of porting/KSP code and Ps4 architecture.

I meant an estimated time FROM the community. Maybe someone who has knowledge of porting/KSP code and Ps4 architecture.

Color me clueless, then. (That color is fuchsia.)

I've never known the KSP community to get an ETA on anything except the 1.0 release. I don't think that'll change with the system type it's running on.

Console games usually have well hyped release dates. I know I've been waiting for Fallout 4, and its release date was announced 4 months ago.

I hope we also get a firm date, it also makes good marketing sense to have a release date they can publicize.

I seem to remember max saying something when it was announced.

Let me see if i can find anything.

- Sam

Edit:

Found some info, there is more about if you look hard

TL;DR

"The team at Squad is hoping to have KSP availably by the third quarter of this year."

No idea how accurate that is now though.

Edited October 6, 2015 by sam.johnson841
What does that say? I am at school and that is blocked.

...

"The team at Squad is hoping to have KSP availably by the third quarter of this year."

...

It is currently October. As in the fourth quarter of the year. They've clearly missed that target by at least a few months.

It is currently October. As in the fourth quarter of the year. They've clearly missed that target by at least a few months.

Since this small studio with only recent experience is simple mobile games are now doing 3 ports at the very same time, it surely wont be this year...

I really hope this is not why suddenly unity 5 port is apparently not even close to release when they stated long ago that it was 99.9% complete and was about to go into quality testing.

There is no PS4 Eta guys, and asking for release dates is in the rules:

2.3 Forbidden messages

e: Messages that inquire about release dates for future versions of KSP.

The only answer anyone can really give is "when it's done".
